book.note: Lit. "of the anger of the wrath of him"
Lit. "weighing a talent"; a talent was 125 Roman pounds (of 12 ounces each), so this is just under 100 lbs or 43 kg

book.note: Or "in the spirit," referring to the human spirit
Lit. "I marveled a great marvel seeing her"
Lit. "where the woman is seated on them"

book.note: Some of the best manuscripts read "have fallen"
Or "spice"; the term can refer to "spice" in general, or specifically to amomum, a spice from India
